title: Instructional Design for Developing a Mobile Islamic Banking Terminology Explanation App

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of Islamic finance concepts
context.additional_context: Learners participate in developing an app to study Islamic banking terminology in multiple languages (Malay-Arabic-English) via mobile devices. Formative assessments improve prototypes and optimize user interfaces.

learning_goals: Learners can accurately interpret 50 core Islamic banking terms in multiple languages (Malay-Arabic-English).
Learners can develop a mobile app prototype in three stages (requirements analysis-design-evaluation) using a rapid prototyping model.
Learners can meet at least 80% of the app interface design requirements that reflect user needs (device type, internet accessibility, etc.).

resources: Mobile App Development Tools (e.g., Figma, Android Studio)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
